content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) with a drop position at (41.5, -80.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) and (42.5, -80.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) transferring items between the chests and furnace
- Additional Iron Chests at positions (44.5, -80.5), (45.5, -80.5), (47.5, -80.5), (49.5, -80.5), (51.5, -79.5), (53.5, -79.5), (55.5, -79.5), and (60.5, -79.5) for storage

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) with a drop position at (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (-16.5, -48.5), (-14.5, -48.5), (-15.5, -48.5), (-13.5, -49.5), (-12.5, -49.5), (-9.5, -49.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (-10.5, -49.5), (-11.5, -49.5), (-8.5, -49.5), (-7.5, -48.5) for transferring items between chests and furnaces

### Iron Plate Storage and Transfer System
Consists of the following entities:
- Iron Chests at positions (-17.5, -47.5), (-16.5, -47.5), (-15.5, -47.5), (-14.5, -47.5), (-12.5, -45.5), (-10.5, -45.5), (-11.5, -45.5), (-8.5, -45.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (-12.5, -44.5), (-10.5, -44.5), (-8.5, -44.5) for transferring items between chests

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Extracting Items from Chests
- Ensure that there is a sufficient quantity of the item in the chest before attempting to extract. The quantity to extract must be greater than 0.

### Errors when Chests are Full
- Regularly check and empty chests that are full to prevent mining and production processes from halting. Ensure that there is available space in the destination chest before transferring items.

### Errors with Inserters Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that the source entity has items available for the inserter to pick up. Regularly refuel inserters and ensure they are correctly positioned to pick up items from the source.
